Title: Provides that a capital tax levy shall not be included within the definition of "tax levy limit"
Summary: Provides that a capital tax levy shall not be included within the definition of "tax levy limit"; defines "capital local expenditures" and "capital tax levy".
LawCode: Amd ยง3-c, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to capital tax levies to support local tax expenditures; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
